name: The Aurorachord
description:
In this short musical mini-game from an early prototype of The Lost Weld (https://www.mamamakesgames.com/thelostweld), you time the arrow keys/D-Pad and spacebar/A button to match musical rhythms that fall from the screen towards you Aurorachord, a magical instrument played on the Isle of Mist. This was game was made in a couple of days during prototyping of The Lost Weld by Kimberly Blais with original music by Madame X. It just has one song, but I hope you enjoy it! ❤️

Currently only available for 64-bit Windows.
